title: Stabber
data:
{{obsolete}}

Monsters with the '''Stabber''' flag will try to maintain their distance (using ranged attacks) until such a time as their target is incapacitated, at which time they switch to melee to attack their target. Stabbers without a means of ranged attack will assume normal monster behavior. These monsters also bypass half the target's [[AC]] on stabs.

In past versions, [[spriggan enchanter]]s and [[spriggan assassin]]s had this flag.

*[[:Category:Stabber|List of monsters with this flag]]

==History==
This flag was added in [[0.13]].
